reports.label: Batch Class analysis
reports.description: This report displays statistics about a specific batch class over a period of time. It displays the repartition of the completion time, and lists all batch instances.

reports.label: Batch Class detailed analysis
reports.description: This report displays statistics about a specific batch class over a period of time. It displays statistics for all plugin and module.

reports.label: Manual Step analysis
reports.description: This report displays statistics about manual step execution.
